Posts.EditableText: When I have music looping in my game, it pauses between the end and beginning. Is this something I have to deal with or is there a workaround for this? I can post it if necessary. Thanks for any input. I'm kind of a brand newbian.

Posts.EditableText: There may be a slight gap. But check that you don't have any silence at the beginning or end of the sound file, as of course that will make the gap sound longer.
